title: The declaration and proclamation of the army of God, owned by the Lord of Hosts in many victories, to all the good people of God throughout England, Scotland, and Ireland, &c. whereunto is annexed 17 necessary proposals for the enthro[ning] of Gods laws ...
author: Chamberlen, Peter, 1601-1683.
publisher: Printed by J. Clowes for the authour,
notes: Attributed to Peter Chamberlen. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
